entry.title: Why 200 Acres
entry.content:
The name 200 acres was inspired by the Location of the bee hives on the edge of the Stray in Harrogate North Yorkshire. The stray is an historic allotment of 200 acres for public use.

In Spring the Stray puts on a wonderful show.

entry.title: Swarm season
entry.content:
Swarm season is upon us, this time generally begins in April in the UK and continues until the bees start to shut down for the winter.

A swarm is the bees method of reproducing, whereby a new queen is born and the old queen leaves with a portion of the hiveâ€™s population to start a new colony away from home.
